text: Berghem () is a small hamlet in the Netherlands, in the province of Limburg. It is located about 1 km south of the town of Gulpen, in the municipality of Gulpen-Wittem.ANWB Topografische Atlas Nederland, Topografische Dienst and ANWB, 2005. In the 19th century, the hamlet had about 100 inhabitants; nowadays, it is not much larger. ==References== Category:Populated places in Limburg (Netherlands) Category:Gulpen-Wittem
title: Berghem, Limburg
